A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Overall\, I loved Last Jedi. It's more of a character driven film than a plot driven one\, which was interesting to see. When looking at the main theme of the film\, failure\, I think this makes sense\, as one cannot expect much progress to be made in a film where to focus is on what goes wrong. Much like the Empire Strikes back\, I think this film has initially rubbed fans the wrong way\, but there is no doubt in my mind that it will come to be well loved like ESB is. I did have some issues\, hence the 4 stars instead of five- mainly with the pacing. However\, I found that the characters were so engaging\, and watching them develop over the course of the movie so enjoyable\, that I was able to sit through this rather long film and not be put off by the sometimes choppy progression. I am thoroughly looking forward to Episode IX\, where I hope that we get more of the brilliant character growth that we saw in this film.
